We are hiring for Structural Design Engineer Profile vacant with Leading Engineering mfg. Industry for Navi Mumbai Location.

title: System Integration Engineer
tagsAndSkills: PLM,V&V design,Design Development,System Integrators,System Integration,Aerospace,Drone,DMU
jobDescription:
System Integrators

Job Title

System Integration Engineer

Department

R&D - Mech

Job Description

  • UAV/Drone System Specifications: Analysis of Product Requirement Documents in sync with Market Requirements, prepare and maintain Technical Specifications at UAV and Systems level, including Technology Readiness Level (TRL), Work Breakdown Structures (WBS) creations etc.
  • UAV/Drone System Design: Collaborate with product design and development teams to define and design UAV/drone systems that align with project objectives and client requirements. Exposure to Fundamental Aerodynamics, Materials and Process Engineering would be added advantage.
  • Design Management: Expertise in CAD Tree/Layout preparations, PLM/PDM integrations with 3D CAD, 3D Model sanctity and Integration checks, BOM Configurations and Management, GD&T, Tolerance Stack up Analysis, DFMEA etc.
  • Validation & Verification of Design: Skilled at planning of Validations e.g, Numerical Validations, Laboratory Testing, Flight Testing, Certifications etc.
  • Component Selection and Manufacturing/Sourcing: Select appropriate hardware components, Electronic components, and software solutions for UAV/drone systems, taking into consideration factors such as payload capacity, flight time, range, endurance, and environmental conditions. Good knowledge of Manufacturing processes, Design for Manufacturing and Assembly (DFMA) etc.
  • Integration and Testing: Integrate various hardware, electronics and software components into UAV/drone systems, ensuring compatibility, reliability, and optimal performance. Conduct rigorous testing and debugging to resolve issues.
  • Software Configuration: Configure flight control systems, autopilot software, and onboard computers to ensure seamless communication and operation of the drone.
  • Quality and Reliability: Develop and implement quality and reliability control processes starting with Concept Design, Development, Testing & Validations, Industrializations and Series Productions, to verify the functionality and safety of integrated UAV/drone systems.
  • Documentation: Maintain detailed documentation of System Integration processes, configurations, Design and System Engineering Reviews, Validation plan vs actual, and test results to facilitate troubleshooting and future development.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including Product management, Product marketing, Manufacturing, Sourcing, Quality management, software engineers, Electronics Engineers, Hardware engineers, and Project managers, to achieve project goals and deadlines.
  • Stay Informed: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and regulatory changes related to drone systems to ensure compliance and competitiveness.

SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Bachelor''s degree in Aerospace engineering, Mechanical, Electrical engineering, or a related field. Master''s degree preferred.
  • Proven experience in UAV/drone system integration or a related field.
  • Proficiency in drone hardware and software, including flight controllers, sensors, and autopilot systems.
  • Good knowledge and experience of CAD and PLM Softwares. PTC Creo and Windchill experience would be preferred.
  • Familiarity with drone regulations and safety standards.
  • Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.

title: Junior Manager/Assistant Manager - IP (Intellectual property)
tagsAndSkills: Intellectual Property,Patent Analysis,Patent Drafting,Patents,Patent Search,Knowledge Management,IP,Patent Research
jobDescription:
Job Description
Job title Junior Manager/Assistant Manager-IP Span R&D
Function Knowledge Management Job Family Officer
Reporting to (position) Senior Manager-Knowledge Management Direct Reportees
Purpose Statement
To support KM functions relating to patents, literature survey, technology competitive intelligence and Knowledge Management in the
field of chemical synthesis
Key Role & Responsibilities
FUNCTIONAL RESPONSIBILITIES:
The incumbent will be responsible for supporting the searches on various paid databases such as Sci-Finder, Reaxys, Questel Orbit, etc.,
and non-paid databases such as PCT Scope and online patent databases of various countries.
The incumbent shall also be responsible for supporting tailor made Technology Landscapes Reports providing the current technology
trends and the knowledge of existing technology to the management. He should be able to understand and crystalize the key aspects of
the technology.
The incumbent should also be able to support patentability searches, Freedom to operate searches, patent drafting, writing experimental
sections for patents, collecting and managing KM files.
The incumbent should also be able to support the Technology Competitive Landscapes searches and prepare reports thereof.
The incumbent should also be open to take up the functions/assignments that may be allotted to KM.
The incumbent is expected to analyze, summarize and conclude the patent, non-patent literature with respect to various technologies
including chemical synthesis, polymers, electronic chemicals, energy chemicals, agrochemicals, dyes, pigments etc.
REQUISITE SKILLS:
Willingness to pursue a career in IP and learn the new concepts in IP.
Excellent command over the English language (written & verbal).
Open for new learnings and adapting to the KM function.
Self-motivated, positive disruptive thinking and strong team player.
High personal and professional ethics including maintaining confidentiality.
Internal & External Relationship
Function / Agency Purpose of Interaction Frequency
Job specification
Experience 2 to 4 years of working experience in industry
Qualification Master of Science- Organic Chemistry. PhD shall be considered positively.
Certifications/Trainings Not Mandatory. Any certification in IP or Knowledge Management shall be considered positively.
Competencies Behavioural Team player. Adaptability. Open mindset for accepting different views. Mutual respect for
colleagues. Quest for learning.Functional Good understanding of chemical conversions/reactions.
